version_description: Journey to Pixeland, home of the cute & quirky Pixelings.

Bug Fixes:
- Unexpected error messages while choosing a username: error 104, 105 and 307.
- Players with VIP still have to watch an ad to refill energy or speed up a chest opening.
- A draw result screen might show even if a player won in Arena.
- Pixelings in your current team might not be visible when opening the Edit Team screen.
- Account linking and recovering failures do not report the correct error message.
- Players can obtain the same daily quest twice, then causing an error 904 when claiming one of them.
- The Poison Burst passive might soft-lock the battle under some circumstances
- Other minor bug fixes & improvements

Bug Fixes
-Glitchy’s ability in W2 Mission 14 no longer freezes the game
-Story battles no longer freeze before the result screen
-Special characters are no longer valid in Guild names
-Instant wins no longer reset energy refill timer
-Daily quests now refresh properly
-Fixed several guild-related bugs
-Other UI & bug fixes

Improvements
-Added a confirmation prompt before giving up a battle
-Change Username prompt now displays the Bux cost on the OK button

Balancing
-Various tweaks to Daily quests

-Competitive PvP with ranked ladder is now live
-Express yourselves in PVP matches with new Emotes
-Unlock new avatars when you unlock Pixelings
-New helpful tooltips when tapping icons within most menus
-Charge Ability and Troll tutorials now in the game
-Guild chat no longer disappears
-Multiple balancing changes
-Additional PvP AFK countermeasures
-General improvements & quality of life changes
-Several bug fixes

Visit our website for the full patch notes!

-Travel to Slumberland (world 3) and continue your epic adventure alongside PewDiePie
-Collect 8 new Pixelings & 3 new Spells
-Guild Chests (new feature): Work hand-in-hand with your guild mates to unlock the guild chest rewards
-Chest drop odds rebalance
-Spell rebalance
-Story Mission extra rewards rebalance
-App performance optimization
-Minor bug fixes and improvements

* PvP Seasons are now live: earn monthly rewards & complete New Season Quests
* 3 new PvP tiers
* Guild Duels: duel fellow guild mates & experiment with maxed out Pixelings
* Collect 5 New Pixelings
* Team Loadouts: purchase up to 3 extra Loadout slot
* Battle improvements (Mana generation, action bar, emotes)
* Matchmaking fix to prevent exploit (using 2-3 weak Pixelings)
* Other matchmaking improvements
* Spells now scale according to team power
* Pixeling scaling rebalance
* Other balancing changes

-PvP season progression should now update properly and not only upon relaunching the game
-Players should no longer remain stuck on a dark screen when attempting to view an ad
-Guild leaders should no longer have trouble seeing the ‘Guild Info’ popup
-Other minor bug fixes and improvements

-Onwards to Crushopolis, a mysterious, mechanical world!
-Collect 8 new Pixelings
-Collect 3 new spells
-Minor bug fixes and improvements

-Onwards to Crushopolis, a mysterious, mechanical world!
-Collect 8 new Pixelings
-Collect 3 new spells
-Minor bug fixes and improvements

-The “Cure” spell should no longer remove negative effects on “Spell-immune” Pixelings
-Fixed a bug that would cause undeployed Pixelings to be affected by negative status effects
-Fixed a bug that would cause the game to soft lock at the end of a PvP match
-Fixed an exploit that would allow players to easily obtain 3 Stars on PvE missions
-Fixed various VFX bugs related to spells and Pixeling abilities
-Player icons should display properly in the Guild Chest Contributions list
